item.title: T680 Custom Kit v1.0.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 13, 2025

T680 Custom Kit v1.0.1 ATS

This mod works through the “Sun Visor” slot, which is close to the “Cabflares” slot.

Currently, it adds:
– Customized Sun Visor with lighting options
– Side light bars near the side mirror.

Update for v1.53

Credits: Burubin

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Sound Fixes Pack v25.03 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 13, 2025

Sound Fixes Pack v25.03 ETS2

CHANGELOG v25.03
Comprehensive sounds added to the 1996 Adtranz DB Class 481 electric multiple unit train for the Berlin S-Bahn. [ETS2 edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the Siemens Desiro Classic electric multiple unit train. [ETS2 edition]
Minor sound adjustments for the Siemens Vectron train. [ETS2 edition]
2003 Chevrolet Express sound set is now the default sound set for car_default_3.soundref in AI traffic. [ATS edition]

DESCRIPTION
This mod has been bringing more immersion to common sounds in the game for over 9 years!
It packs a variety of sound content within one mod, making it great value within the 100 mod limit in Convoy multiplayer.

COMPATIBILITY
* ETS2 1.53.3 + ATS 1.53.2. No errors in game log. Must have high priority in Mod Manager.
* Does not replace individual player truck sounds, so this mod can be used with an unlimited amount of truck sound mods of your choice.
* Compatible with all maps and all trucks, including truck mods.
* Supported in single-player and multiplayer Convoy mode, and is marked as an optional mod in Convoy.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
Requires higher priority in Mod Manager than:
– any map mods (e.g. ProMods)
– any AI traffic mods (e.g. traffic packs and traffic pack add-ons)
– any rain sound mods

FEATURE LIST
The mod features meticulously crafted sounds, covering the following:
– Suspension and tire bump sounds for your truck and trailer.
– Fuel / filling station sounds.
– Door close and seatbelt sounds after refueling.
– Train sound enhancements for several locomotives and railroad cars.
– Country/state specific railroad crossing bell sounds.
– The most complete tire sound package for all terrains: asphalt, gravel, grass, snow, and sleeper lines.
– Wet tire sound for the player’s truck tires when the asphalt roads are wet.
– Reworked tire screech/skid sound effects.
– Nokia phone ringtone sound replacing the hurry up / late music, leading to less stress for the player.
– Default common sound reworks, such as improved default air brake sounds.
– AI traffic vehicle sound improvements, with engine and horn sounds uniquely set for specific vehicles.
– English AU/UK/US voice navigation variants with speaker effect added and uncustomary phrases removed.
– Wind buffeting and rush of air sounds at high speeds only when the window is open.
– More environmental and ambient sounds, and tasteful changes to existing ambient sounds in the game world.
– Trailer coupling, trailer brace rotation, and trailer sliding axle sounds.
– 5 standalone air horns.
– Dynamic rain sounds, and an assortment of different thunder sounds with delay.
– Default gear grinding sound effect additions and improvements.
– Stronger reverb effects when under bridges and overpasses.
– (ATS only) Drawbridge lift warning sound for the Columbia River Interstate Bridge.
– (ATS only) Working sounds for the Musical Road on the Historic Route 66.
– (Optional) Reefer / refrigerated trailer sound functionality.
– (Optional – ATS only) Cop scouting reports via CB radio (enable in voice navigation options).
– Fixes for World Ambient sound glitches from the vanilla game and/or mods.

For further immersion, the mod may also include official paint colors and more authentic specifications for each AI traffic vehicle it modifies for sound. Rarer paint colors are less likely to be seen.

Credits: SCS Software, Drive Safely, antonvezdehod, Darkcaptain, Frontiersman, Grinch, Katixa, Kriechbaum, Max2712, Trayscapes, Vasily (Engine Voice Records), Zeemod

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania Trucks v1.53.3.21 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 13, 2025

Scania Trucks v1.53.3.21 ATS

Scania Trucks for American Truck Simulator

Changelog (V1.53.3.21):
– added the new Steam inventory items from the Cupid’s Express Event

This mod fully convert the Scania trucks from Euro Truck Simulator 2 to American Truck Simulator.

WARNING: highly recommended to use the Scanias in a separate profile, since some wheels, rims and roof accessories conflicts with the ATS ones, plus for the better Scania experience, some data files also changed to ETS2 ones like mirror FOV. Sorry for these things, they are not bugs, just shows the differences beetween the 2 game.

Everything works on all Scanias, language files are there for all 43 languages with the original lines from ETS2. You can use ETS2 DLCs if you have them. They will works perfectly with this truck. (Mighty Griffin Tuning Pack, Rims DLC, Cabin Accessories, etc.). Steam Inventory items (which both games have) work too.

Credits: Dani02

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Real SCS AI Country Spawns mod v1.2.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 13, 2025

Real SCS AI Country Spawns mod v1.2.1 ETS2

This mod sets all SCS cars to REAL SPAWNS BY COUNTRY they appear in. Every country has custom setting of all cars spawning, according to the real traffic and car brands popularity. Spawns follow also country’s wealth, which means no more luxury cars on every corner in less wealthy countries like Romania or Macedonia for example. I studied those countries using sells statistics and dashcam videos from most countries, this is actually result of several years of work and constant improving.

Countries with spawns set are all SCS countries. Add-on also supports and set spawns for these map mods: Promods, Promods Middle-East, Promods Great Steppe, Road to Asia and Road To Africa (by Terramaps), Java Road Revolution map (= Indonesia map), Maghreb map mod (North part of Africa), Heart of Africa and Horn of Africa maps.

List of countries set:
AFGHANISTAN, ALBANIA, ANDORRA, AUSTRIA, AZERBAIJAN, BELGIUM, BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA, BULGARIA, CAMEROON, CHAD, CHINA, CROATIA, CYPRUS, CZECH REPUBLIC, DENMARK + FAROE ISLANDS, EGYPT, ESTONIA, ETHIOPIA, FINLAND + ALAND, FRANCE, GAMBIA, GEORGIA, GERMANY, GREECE, GREENLAND, HUNGARY, ICELAND, INDONESIA (JRR map), IRAQ, IRAN, IRELAND, ITALY, JORDAN, KAZAKHSTAN, KOSOVO, KYRGYZSTAN, LATVIA, LEBANON, LIBERIA, LIBYA, LITHUANIA, LUXEMBOURG, MACEDONIA, MONACO, MONTENEGRO, MOLDOVA, MORROCO, NETHERLANDS, NIGERIA, NORTH KOREA, NORWAY, PAKISTAN, POLAND, PORTUGAL, ROMANIA, RUSSIA, SAUDI ARABIA, SENEGAL, SERBIA, SLOVAKIA, SLOVENIA, SOMALIA, SOUTH KOREA, SPAIN, SUDAN, SWEDEN + SVALBARD, SWITZERLAND, SYRIA, TAJIKISTAN, THAILAND, TUNISIA, TURKEY, TURKMENISTAN, UKRAINE, UNITED KINGDOM, UZBEKISTAN, WEST BANK (PALESTINE)

REAL COLOURS:
– Added real colours for all SCS cars! Colours follow their real popularity, so expect more grey, silver, red and blue cars in traffic, while yellow and green are made to be rare (if the car had it available). Vans spawn mostly in white colours.

List of fixes:
– Added black pillars for Peugeot 3008
– Added black C-pillar for Citroen C5 Tourer
– Fixed lampmasks for Fiat Ducato van and VW Passat B8 Variant
– Little improved lamps texture for VW Golf V
– Mercedes-Benz W124 spawns only in white to cover the SCS bug with white bumpers.

Wheel changes:
– Changed wheels for Peugeot Boxer flatbed van, Skoda Superb both liftback and station wagon, VW Touran, Skoda Fabia I, Mercedes-Benz W124, Alfa Romeo Giulietta and Kia Cee’d SW.

New features:
– Unlocked hidden car trailers in traffic.
– Wheels variations on selected cars.
– Service vans VW Transporter and Ford Transit now have the same shade of orange as lift platform Fiat Ducato, to fit in together.
– Expensive or modern cars have xenon/LED lights shade on road surface.

Credits: Egon

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
